name: default_training_rubric
description: General-purpose rubric for remote-work etiquette emails.

items.name: Tone & respect
items.description: Email is polite and respectful, not too casual or emotional.

items.name: Clarity & conciseness
items.description: Message is easy to understand and not too long.

items.name: Structure
items.description: Email has a clear greeting, organized body, and proper closing.

items.name: Professionalism & responsibility
items.description: Student takes responsibility where needed and shows commitment.

items.name: Task fulfillment
items.description: Student clearly answers the request or makes a clear ask.
